Online Assessment System - Test Delivery Client Bootstrap

The bootstrap application is used to launch the various components needed by the Online Assessment System's Test Delivery Client.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap  
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.exception  
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.processwrapper  
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.processwrapper.monitor  
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.ui  
com.ctb.tdc.bootstrap.util  

 

The bootstrap application is used to launch the various components needed by the Online Assessment System's Test Delivery Client. The main class launches the following components in the following sequence:

  • Jetty Servlet Container
  • Lockdown Browser

Each component is run from the environment itself and not from within the JVM used to run the bootsrap.
